attributes.action: to make ticket touting illegal in the uk - only pay face value not more
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this petition is to make a law on buying tickets for any event for face value then selling for more for your own personal profit

i tried to buy tickets to watch the carling cup final only to find that the face value tickets where ₤38 each but the ones they had available to buy where ₤280 each which is not a price we proper fans should have to pay

tickets with the face value should only be available for that value and not sold for more on ebay and ticket master and all other tickets of peoples personal gain

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ticketresale/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
